document_data.name: Emmet
document_data.mainbody:
'''Emmet''' was a commoner and the father of [[Gabe]] from the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''You heading to the circus too? I'm glad it's here - we could use fun, what with everything going on.''|Emmet}}
document_data.Description: Like his son, Emmet was a [[human]] with raven-black hair and dark eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Emmet and his son set out to watch a performance by a beloved clown â€“ [[Dribbles]] of the [[Circus of the Last Days]]. Emmet welcomed a short distraction from the [[Absolute crisis]], but due to the recently skyrocketed crime and unrest, the circus gates were guarded by [[wood elf]] [[Klaus]] and his trained [[ghoul]] partner [[Benji (ghoul)|Benji]], who sniffed out blood on the hands of the guests. Gabe, however, was afraid of the [[undead]] monster and hesitated to enter.
